quest.name: The Ultimate Weapon
journal: Raubahn has some parting words for you ahead of the final phase of Operation Archon.

* This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Raubahn at Raubahn's Push.

※The Main Scenario Guide shows the next available quest. You can toggle it on and off in Character Configuration, under UI Settings.

You are ready to depart for the Praetorium, the stage upon which the fate of the realm shall soon be decided. Fight your way into the depths of the structure, in search of the Ultima Weapon, and when you find the Allagan relic...send a piece of it to each of the seven hells.

※The Praetorium can be accessed via the Duty Finder.

With Gaius van Baelsar slain, and the Ultima Weapon destroyed, it would seem that Eorzea may finally look forward to an era of peace. Yet even as the people of the three city–states gather to celebrate their deliverance, a deafening roar reverberates throughout every corner of the realm...
A dread primal has awakened.
What fearsome primal is this that has been roused? Perhaps Minfilia will be able to shed some light on the mystery.

In troubled tones, Minfilia reveals to you that shortly after the roar was heard around the land, an aetheric disturbance was observed, bearing a disquieting similarity to a phenomenon recorded five years ago. It would seem that your struggles are far from over. Steel your resolve anew, and set forth to shine the Crystal's light upon the realm.
objectives: * This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Raubahn at Raubahn's Push.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: For the final phase of the operation, my Flames will storm Castrum Meridianum and suppress what is left of the imperial garrison. If all goes well, this will allow you to reach the Praetorium unopposed─fit and ready for your encounter with the Ultima Weapon.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: Yours is the most dangerous mission of all, but the best must bear the heaviest burden, and you're the best we have. There's not another soul in this realm that could see this deed done, and Merlwyb and Kan–E are of the same mind as me.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: Though all hangs on your success, you must not let our plight make you desperate. Victory belongs to the bold, not the reckless. Bards are wont to sing of heroes who valued their life at naught next to honor, love, and liberty, but I tell you now: that which men value at naught, they sell cheap. Risk no more than you must, you hear me?

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: Now, best you were off─we have work to do, the both of us. See that your preparations are in order, then report to Cid. He awaits you with the Enterprise at the Ceruleum Processing Plant. May Rhalgr grant you strength.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: The Enterprise is at your disposal. When you're ready to head for the Praetorium, you need only say the word.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: If we succeed in destroying the Ultima Weapon, it will deal a crippling blow to the Empire's hopes of conquest. After that, the XIVth Legion would not dare to move against us─barring the discovery of further Allagan doomsday devices, that is...

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Let's be on our way, Forename! Gaius and his plaything await!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: The Enterprise is at your disposal. When you're ready to head for the Praetorium, you need only say the word.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: So here we are...

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: The Ultima Weapon will almost certainly be housed in the depths of the complex.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: You know, the sort of place a Warrior of Light would boldly go with no thought for personal safety. Oh, if only one were with us!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: This is it, my friend!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Gaius!

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Ah, Cid, my boy... You are late.

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: There is something I always meant to tell you, yet the time never seemed right. It concerns your father.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: ...What of him?

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: In the winter of his years, Midas came to abhor his part in Meteor. He told me that he wanted nothing more than to wash his hands of the whole sordid business.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: But he did not wash his hands of it. He helmed the project until the day it killed him!

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Come now, Cid...you must know that he did not have the luxury of choice. By the time he realized his error, it was too late. Meteor had him completely in its thrall.

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Shortly before his...transformation, mayhap sensing that something was amiss, your father confided to me all the regrets of his life. Most of them concerned you.

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Early on in your career, he realized that while you had a talent for devising armaments, it would never fulfill you. Long before you knew your own mind, he saw that you would be far happier using your knowledge for peaceful purposes, and the thought touched him. He was a changed man for it, though he could not let it show.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: You ripped open walls in this place just so you could say this to me!? What is it you want, Gaius!?

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: I want you at my side, Cid. Take up your father's mantle, and become the Empire's lead engineer. It is your destiny.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: My father had a change of heart─you said so yourself! Besides, I have long known my destiny, and I assure you, it lies not with the Empire!

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text:
A pity.
And what of you, adventurer? Will you not consider making common cause with me?

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: With your powers joined to mine, we might do much for this realm. Together, we could bring order to Eorzea, and usher in a lasting peace.

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: No? And I can expect no better answer than this? So be it. It was your strength that made me proffer my hand in friendship, and it is your strength that makes me proffer now my blade. Save as an ally, you are too dangerous to be let to remain.

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Run, Cid. Or stay. It makes no matter. You cannot escape the past.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Gaius, wait! ...Damn it!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Knowing Gaius, he is headed for the Ultima Weapon. If we find him, so too will we find our quarry.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: With these instruments, we can monitor every nook and cranny in the castrum.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: I think it's time we divided our forces. Pray go on and give chase. I'll track your movements from here and guide you through the complex.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: We'll stay in contact via linkpearl. Be careful, all right?

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Ah, there she is!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: I trust you recognize our old friend. “Maggie,” was it? They must have shipped her here from Centri.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Considering all she's been through, it's a wonder she's still operational. Tough old girl!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Now that you're suitably armed, you can blast open that bulkhead. The external walkway will take you back there.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Follow it till you come upon a way down to the lower level.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: That bulkhead is composed of a special alloy. Extremely tough. Ordinary fire won't leave a mark, I'm afraid.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: You'll need to divert all power to the magitek cannon, as I did at Castrum Meridianum.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: The armor's core is like to expire from the strain, but there's no help for it if we want to press on.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Now, listen well. Press...<buzzzzzz>...the control...<fizzzzzz>...engage ancillary...then fire away. Don't mind the warning lights.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: You're a natural at this! All right, the way's clear, but it's just you and your own two feet now, so be careful.

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: You have been leaving a fine mess in your wake, adventurer.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Is someone there!?

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: Garlond, old friend. How it warms the heart to hear your voice again after all these years.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: ...Nero? Is that you!?

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: You sound well. It would seem this savage land agrees with you.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: The highest ranking tribunus of the XIVth... It was you all this time?

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: Tell me, Garlond. How long do you intend to keep all the glory for yourself?

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Uh...what? You've lost me.

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: Don't play the fool with me. Ever since the Academy, I have been condemned to live in your shadow.

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: By all objective measure, I was the more talented of the two of us, yet that fact counted for naught beside your privileged birth. You were admired as the young prodigy simply because your father was the great Midas nan Garlond!

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: When you defected, I felt sure my star would finally rise...

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: But by disappearing, you acquired the status of a legend─your reputed genius gaining credence merely by dint of your absence! Instead of cursing you for a traitor, the people actually came to think of you more fondly! To this day, you are still the young prodigy of magitek!

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: I, meanwhile, have ever been made to feel second-rate─I who have continued to serve our nation faithfully. Whenever I fail to excel─why, it is only to be expected! Yet when I exceed all reasonable expectations, people proclaim that I walk in the footsteps of the great Cid nan bloody Garlond!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Nero, I...I don't know what to say.

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: It matters not a whit what I achieve. Your existence has rendered mine worthless. Even Lord van Baelsar saw fit to offer you a place at his side─and this in spite of your betrayal! Did he extend any such offer to me─the man who has remained loyal to him for all these years? Why, no. He did not.

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: Long have I endured this injustice...but no more.

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: Lord van Baelsar is in the midst of activating the fully powered Ultima Weapon.

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: It is my magnum opus─the creation that will win me the recognition I am due. I will not let anyone interfere.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Nero! What are you─!?

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: Ever since I first set foot in this benighted land, I have watched you─every move you have made, every step you have taken.

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: You have felled eikons, a feat made possible by the Echo, a peculiar power which shields you from their corrupting influence.

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: It is of little wonder that my lord has taken an interest in you.

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: As have I, if truth be told. It is my desire to harness your power for use in the Ultima Weapon.

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: Should I succeed, Lord van Baelsar will surely take notice! Beside this, Garlond's achievements will be as child's play!

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: Come, adventurer, and yield to me the secrets of your power!

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: This changes...nothing...

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: I am the greatest engineer...the Empire has ever seen! By my hands...the field of magitek...shall reach its zenith!

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: Ahahahaha! The Ultima Weapon is activated, and it brims with the power of eikons! Nothing can withstand its might!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Are you all right!?

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: What of Nero!? ...Fled!? Damn it!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: In the instant prior to the blackout, the instruments detected a massive power surge from the deepest chamber.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Gaius is certain to be there! We have no time to waste!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Word arrived from the Alliance a short while ago. It seems the Order of the Twin Adder has completed its blockade of Castrum Centri.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: What hands they can spare are hastening this way even as we speak, and likewise for the Maelstrom. All that's left is to destroy the Ultima Weapon!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: ...I should warn you: the chamber which houses the target appears to be saturated with aetheric energies. There's bound to be heavy interference.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: But even if we lose contact, you must go on. Just don't do anything I wouldn't do, all right?

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Look for the lift's control panel─it'll be somewhere nearby.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Take the lift down, and you should find yourself in the chamber of the Ultima Weapon.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Keep your eyes peeled─Gaius could be waiting for you down there.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Oh, and don't even think about dying. You're too bloody useful!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: The interference is getting worse. I don't think the connection will last much─

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Tell me...for whom do you fight?

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: For whom do you fight?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Myself.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: My friends.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: For Eorzea.

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Hmph! Do you believe in Eorzea?

dialogue.name: Q4
dialogue.text: Do you believe in Eorzea?

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: Yes.

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: No.

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: What the─? I don't even...

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Eorzea's unity is forged of falsehoods. Its city–states are built on deceit. And its faith is an instrument of deception.

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: It is naught but a cobweb of lies. To believe in Eorzea is to believe in nothing.

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: In Eorzea, the beast tribes often summon gods to fight in their stead─though your comrades only rarely respond in kind. Which is strange, is it not?

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Are the “Twelve” otherwise engaged? I was given to understand they were your protectors. If you truly believe them your guardians, why do you not repeat the trick that served you so well at Carteneau, and call them down?

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: They will answer─so long as you lavish them with crystals and gorge them on aether.

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Your gods are no different from those of the beasts─eikons every one. Accept but this, and you will see how Eorzea's faith is bleeding the land dry.

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Nor is this unknown to your masters. Which prompts the question: why do they cling to these false deities? What drives even men of learning─even the great Louisoix─to grovel at their feet?

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: The answer? Your masters lack the strength to do otherwise!

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: For the world of man to mean anything, man must own the world.

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: To this end, he hath fought ever to raise himself through conflict─to grow rich through conquest.

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: And when the dust of battle settles, it is ever the strong who dictate the fate of the weak.

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Knowing this, but a single path is open to the impotent ruler─that of false worship. A path which leads to enervation and death.

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Only a man of power can rightly steer the course of civilization. And in this land of creeping mendacity, that one truth will prove its salvation.

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Come, champion of Eorzea, face me! Your defeat shall serve as proof of my readiness to rule!

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: It is only right that I should take your realm. For none among you has the power to stop me!

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: I had not thought to be so hard-pressed.

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Your strength is...most impressive. Such power befits a ruler!

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Yet you lack the resolve to put it to proper use. A waste.

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Allow me, then, hero, to do that which you will not!

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Bear witness to the true power of the Ultima Weapon!

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: But the Ultima Weapon is all-powerful! Why does my enemy still stand!?

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Can herhis strength truly be so great?

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: It is the blessing of Light that confounds you.

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Lahabrea.

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: Your foe acts under the protection of the Crystal shehe bears.

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: So, this is what empowers herhim.

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: Beyond mortal limits.

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: If you are to prevail, the hammer of Darkness must needs be brought to bear upon the shield of Light.

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: And so it shall, for the Ultima Weapon is host to a power of which you are as yet ignorant.

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Speak plainly, Ascian.

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: The Heart of Sabik. It is the Weapon's core─an enigma whose surface even the vaunted scholars of ancient Allag failed to scratch.

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: The magic within has lain dormant for eons.

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Of what magic do you speak?

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: A spell without parallel. Ultima.

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: I sought the life force of the primals for no other reason but to quicken the core. For the true power of the Ultima Weapon lies within its now-beating Heart!

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Lahabrea... What have you done?

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: No more than was necessary...for my god to be reborn.

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Damn you, Ascian!

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: The hour is at hand! Behold but a sliver of my god's power!

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: And from the deepest pit of the seven hells to the very pinnacle of the heavens, the world shall tremble! Unleash Ultima!

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: Ahahahahahaha!

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Such devastation... This was not my intention...

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: Oh, Hydaelyn...it seems the task of keeping Your champion alive has exhausted what strength You had left.

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: Van Baelsar... Your enemy's shield is broken.

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: The rest I leave to you.

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: We will speak later, Ascian.

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: But first, I must deal with you. The question of who is mightier remains!

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Come, adventurer! Let us find the answer together!

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: No... No, no, NO! Uh!

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Heed me... The subjects of a weak ruler must needs look to a higher power for providence...and their dependence comes at a cost to the realm.

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: The misguided elevate the frail... And the frail lead the people astray.

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: Unless a man of power wrests control...the cycle will never be broken.

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: You... You of all people must see the truth in this. You who have the strength to rule...

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: Pathetic.

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: You boasted of unrivaled power. You were entrusted with the ultimate weapon. The ultimate magic!

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: And still you failed. So much for the glory of man.

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: The growing imbalance afflicting the planet must be redressed.

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: If it is permitted to worsen, the very laws of existence─both aetheric and physical─will be warped beyond all recognition.

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: Know you the root of this corruption? Hydaelyn!

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: Like a parasite, She must be burned out if the planet is to recover.

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: And naught but the return of the one true god will ensure Her complete excision.

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: Yet to pave the way for the master's return, a chaotic confluence of untold proportions must needs be brought about. And that will necessitate the presence of the primals.

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: Needless to say, both you and your Scion accomplices can not be suffered to interfere in this endeavor.

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: You will not leave this place alive.

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: It is past time your flame was extinguished...“Bringer of Light.”

dialogue.name: HYDAELYN
dialogue.text: If thou wouldst pierce the shadows...make thee a blade of Light.

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: What!?

dialogue.name: WARRIORSOFLIGHT
dialogue.text: Yaaarrrgh!

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: The Light...it binds them... They are too many!

dialogue.name: LAHABREAEORZEA
dialogue.text: Aaaaaaaaarrrgh!!!

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: And so my conquest ends, Cid.

dialogue.name: GAIUS
dialogue.text: In smoke and ashes...

dialogue.name: HYDAELYN
dialogue.text: Hear... Feel... Think...

dialogue.name: HYDAELYN
dialogue.text: Warrior of Light. Beloved daughterson.

dialogue.name: HYDAELYN
dialogue.text: The Darkness hath fled before the unclosed brilliance of thy spirit.

dialogue.name: HYDAELYN
dialogue.text: Yet it lingereth still beyond the sight of men, in forgotten corners of the world.

dialogue.name: HYDAELYN
dialogue.text: In the depths of the abyss yet resideth the Dark One, watchful ever.

dialogue.name: HYDAELYN
dialogue.text: Till this evil be cast out, never shall the world know aught but a passing peace.

dialogue.name: HYDAELYN
dialogue.text: Yet for the present, a gentle light shineth o'er the realm of Eorzea.

dialogue.name: HYDAELYN
dialogue.text: With thee at its heart.

dialogue.name: HYDAELYN
dialogue.text: From sparkling mote shall it swell to glorious sun, and all the world shall bask in its warmth.

dialogue.name: HYDAELYN
dialogue.text: Blessings and joy be upon thee.

dialogue.name: HYDAELYN
dialogue.text: Go forth, my child, and be as a beacon of hope for Eorzea and the lands beyond, through all the days of thy life.

dialogue.name: A00910
dialogue.text: My lady! All Twin Adder units have fallen back to the outer perimeter!

dialogue.name: A00920
dialogue.text: The Flames have completed their withdrawal, General!

dialogue.name: A00930
dialogue.text: Admiral! All hands accounted for!

dialogue.name: A00940
dialogue.text: SheHe's still in there...

dialogue.name: A00950
dialogue.text: Cid! Has there been no word?

dialogue.name: A00960
dialogue.text: Nothing. Nothing at all.

dialogue.name: A00970
dialogue.text: Damnation!

dialogue.name: A00980
dialogue.text: SheHe's going to make it! I know shehe is!

dialogue.name: A00990
dialogue.text: Yda is right. We must have faith.

dialogue.name: A01000
dialogue.text: Cid! Can they not be evacuated aboard the Enterprise?

dialogue.name: A01010
dialogue.text: That adventurer and the Scions are as the Warriors of Light reborn.

dialogue.name: A01020
dialogue.text: We cannot abandon them to their fate! Not again!

dialogue.name: A01030
dialogue.text: I wholeheartedly agree! But flying into the midst of that would only add to the fireworks!

dialogue.name: A01040
dialogue.text: There must be something we can do!

dialogue.name: A01050
dialogue.text: Please, Mother Hydaelyn. Please light herhis way through the darkness...

dialogue.name: HYDAELYN
dialogue.text: Look into the Light, my child. If thou wouldst see thy companions returned safe to thee, reach out to them now.

dialogue.name: A01070
dialogue.text: It's herhim. I feel herhis presence!

dialogue.name: A01080
dialogue.text: Can it be─? Is it really herhim!?

dialogue.name: A01090
dialogue.text: I knew it! I knew it all along!

dialogue.name: A01100
dialogue.text: Who speaks...? The Crystal! She calls to us!

dialogue.name: A01110
dialogue.text: I hear Her! The voice of Hydaelyn Herself...

dialogue.name: A01120
dialogue.text:
She speaks of...
Strike me down! No wonder shehe seemed familiar! SheHe's one of the Warriors of Light!

dialogue.name: A01130
dialogue.text: What are you smirking at, Cid!? You knew, didn't you!?

dialogue.name: A01140
dialogue.text: Oh, you mean our adventurer friend? Did I forget to mention shehe was one of the Warriors of Light?

dialogue.name: A01150
dialogue.text: Saved Eorzea, you know. Twice.

dialogue.name: A01160
dialogue.text: The shroud is lifted. They remember you...

dialogue.name: A01170
dialogue.text: There!

dialogue.name: A01180
dialogue.text: Oh!

dialogue.name: A01190
dialogue.text: Yay!

dialogue.name: A01200
dialogue.text: Our Warrior of Light!

dialogue.name: A01210
dialogue.text: Yes! The hero returns!

dialogue.name: A01220
dialogue.text: Look! Thancred is with herhim!

dialogue.name: A01230
dialogue.text: Thank the Twelve!

dialogue.name: A01240
dialogue.text: Thank Hydaelyn...

dialogue.name: A01250
dialogue.text: Welcome home.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: The Archons have conducted a preliminary investigation into the origin of the roar that rang out during the celebration. Their findings strongly suggest that a new primal has appeared.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: The roar generated a distinctive wave pattern in the aether, a pattern observed only once before in history─five years ago, to be precise. I should like to think it mere coincidence, yet we cannot discount that possibility... Well, I trust I need say no more.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: At great sacrifice, we have delivered Eorzea from the threat posed by the Empire and the primals, and thereby secured peace. We cannot well allow the realm to be plunged into chaos once more.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: You have given your all for our cause, risking life and limb on I know not how many occasions, yet our struggle continues, and we need you now no less than before.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Please continue to stand with us, and together we shall safeguard the future of the realm─of this very star!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You can now fly while mounted in La Noscea, Thanalan, the Black Shroud, Coerthas central highlands, and Mor Dhona.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To take flight, simply jump while mounted.
